links.description: This file defines the system information that does not need to be localized.

link.description: Number of recent accounts to show in the list
If tariffs are needed set this to TRUE.

Default name space associated with the primary alias for the dialog DefaultDialogAddAccount.asp. This value is hard coded and cannot be changed by the CSR. If the CSR need to chose between more than one name space you need to customize the DefaultDialogAddAccount.asp.
Define the default branded selected in the Add Account Dialog.
Define the default branded selected in the Add Account Dialog.
This entry define the maximum number of subscriber that the find object can return. The number of subscriber is limited to avoid to return the all database.
This entry define the maximum number of CSRs that the find object can return.
Set the type of contact type that can be lookup/display by mam finder. Values are BILL-TO, SHIP-TP, or nothing for all.
Parameter for subscriptions screen: number of days of data that will be shown in the grid. Blank value means show all data.
